thread.title: An amazing dinner at Nirvana Kitchen
thread.title_full: An amazing dinner at Nirvana Kitchen - Review of The Montcalm London Marble Arch, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Romain B
title: An amazing dinner at Nirvana Kitchen
text:
I have been in many nice restaurants around Marble March, but Nirvana Kitchen is definitely the top one I have been to. We went for my Dad's birthday yesterday and it was such a nice atmosphere. The staff is amazing, smilling and so helpful. Tip 1: don't choose and ask the waiter/chef to select a whole menu for you. Tip 2: make sure to get the Lobster curry at least.
Room Tip: Go to Nirvana Kitchen See more room tips
